title: Pop Evil - Lipstick on the Mirror
description:
As always, I strongly encourage you to purchase the CD for yourself. These guys are touring with all kinds of different artists such as Saliva, Theory of a Deadman, Tesla, Vaeda, and so on. Call and request their songs "Hero" and "100 in a 55" on your local radio station. Check out one of their shows for an awesome performance. They keep their tour dates up-to-date on their myspace (just search for Pop Evil)

Tracklist
-------------------------------
Lipstick on the Mirror
1.  Hero
2.  Breathe
3.  Shinedown
4.  100 in a 55
5.  Somebody Like You
6.  3 Seconds to Freedom
7.  Another Romeo & Juliet
8.  Stepping Stone
9.  Jupiter in June
10.  One More Goodbye
11.  Ready or Not
12.  Hard Highway
13.  Hey Mister (Includes acoustic versions of Somebody Like You and Stepping Stone after a short pause)
